name: One Button Jumpy Arcade
description:
Simple one button endless jumpy arcade game made for the VIDEO GAMES LAB: Game Jam 2021.

Press the button (or the space key) to jump and blow up the score. 

Many thanks to Kenney for these incredible assets.

https://kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts
https://kenney.nl/assets/input-prompts-pixel-16
https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-platformer-pack

Thanks to Sean for the webGL Unity template. 
https://seansleblanc.itch.io/better-minimal-webgl-template
